actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide benefits to the survivors of any rescue squad worker who has died as a result of injury sustained in the performance of duty.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Commerce to make grants to States which submit and have approved by the Secretary a plan for providing a benefit to the spouse or dependents of rescue squad workers who die as a direct result of an injury sustained in the performance of duty. Sets forth the standards imposed on the States, and the procedure for payment of benefits and Federal reimbursement of the States.

titles.title: A bill to provide benefits to the survivors of any rescue squad worker who has died as a result of injury sustained in the performance of duty.
